last_episode_to_air.name: Undoing
last_episode_to_air.overview: Camila packs to move in with Roberto Carlos, while Caco tries to cope with her move.

name: Uncoupled in Rio
overview: A couple breaks up but is forced to live in the same apartment together for financial reasons.

episodes.name: Uncoupled
episodes.overview: After being forced to share a cabin on a cruise, Caco and Camila fall for each other. But when their marriage hits the seven-year itch, they end up calling it quits only to have to keep sharing the same apartment due to financial issues.

episodes.name: Unfamiliarities
episodes.overview: To help save the apartment from foreclosure, Camila decides to rent out her room on the internet. Caco gets uncomfortable with the amount of guests coming in and out and asks for help from his best friend, Marcinho. Camila, on the other hand, is working to reconnect with her former bestfriend. Now their friends will show the single life to them once again.

episodes.name: Uncontrollable
episodes.overview: Caco realizes he can’t just be waiting to get his indemnification. Together with his best friend, Marcinho, he starts a BBQ delivery business on his balcony to make money. However, this ends up complicating Camila's business.

episodes.name: Unpredictable
episodes.overview: Caco decides to ask for help from his parents, while Camila is becoming an influencer to help her sales. At the end she ends up meeting Roberto Carlos.

episodes.name: Unreal
episodes.overview: Camila has her first date with Roberto Carlos, but she doesn't want to get involved with such a handsome man. Meanwhile, Caco chases his childhood dream.

episodes.name: Unacceptable
episodes.overview: Caco and Roberto Carlos fight over an old shirt. Paty and Marcinho try to show Camila that maybe Caco misses her.

episodes.name: Undoing
episodes.overview: Camila packs to move in with Roberto Carlos, while Caco tries to cope with her move.
